fields.label: Initiation of marriage talks
fields.placeholder: Who initiated the first talks about marriage and how you broke the news to parents and any difficulties faced convincing them, how did you convince them, in great detail.

fields.label: Family decision details

fields.name: journeyDetails

fields.placeholder: Please explain the journey, how you came to contact each other, and how many dates you guys went, How marriage talk started
